item.title: Salesforce Marketing Analytics App Documentation
item.description:
Installation Follow the link provided to you and select the option to “Install for All Users”.
Configure remote site settings Navigate to Setup > Settings > Security > Remote Site Settings and create a new setting Add the following Remote Site URL: https://www.google-analytics.com Configure Lead Mappings Select Setup under the gear icon on the top right of your screen. In the navigation pane to the left go to Platform Tools > Objects and Fields > Object Manager.

item.title: Defining Attribution Parameters
item.description: Sessions The most common type of session is defined by Google based on time or by a change in campaign. In Google Analytics a new session is created during 30 minutes of inactivity. By default, our sessions are not based on time so you may see session durations in excess of days. This is to minimize the amount of data stored in your visitor’s browsers regarding their session data and not storing additional data for every visit past 30 minutes of inactivity if the source, medium, or campaign has not changed.
